snippet: European investors set up their portfolios to withstand a rise in market volatility in November, building up holdings of safe- haven cash while cutting back on riskier shares, a Reuters poll shows....

headline.print_headline: European Investors Brace for Volatility With Bigger Cash Reserves Reuters Poll
headline.main: European Investors Brace for Volatility With Bigger Cash Reserves Reuters Poll

lead_paragraph: European investors set up their portfolios to withstand a rise in market volatility in November, building up holdings of safe- haven cash while cutting back on riskier shares, a Reuters poll shows.
